item.title: CSS Learning Notes Chapter I
item.description: Try to make a nixos boot animation. (log scroll on screen.) The repo link: https://github.com/ocfox/booti . This site has none imported js or css library. First need make a animation let text display line by line. So I tried to set a delay for every line, when open page hide (don’t display) every paragraph in css. p { display: none; /* Initially hide all paragraphs */ margin: 1px 0 0 1px; } Then set a delay increase by degrees for every single line with js.
